body:
This is a feature request.

I'd like to reuse methods like [newDeploymentInformer()](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/b844f7d4a4018beb664a9f0b075d83f717a631ab/staging/src/k8s.io/client-go/informers/apps/v1beta1/deployment.go#L44) but they are private at the moment.
The use case: I need to construct Informers for a specific namespace (or a set of namespaces) and instead of reusing this code I have to duplicate it many times (per object Kind). Would be awesome if Informers generator is updated to expose an additional method that does the same but also takes a namespace name as an argument. Seems to be no risk and a trivial change.
I'm more than happy to make the change myself if some guidance is provided :)

EDIT: additional details about the use case: I want to be able to limit [Smith](https://github.com/atlassian/smith) to only work with a single namespace because it may be run in a restricted environment where it only has permissions to work within a single namespace. That is a real use case: we have a cluster where a user (a team) gets very limited permissions - can only do things within their own namespace. However such team should be able to use tools like Smith.

I had to copy-paste and modify lots of code for informers I need - see https://github.com/atlassian/smith/pull/58/files#diff-e2db373b7d288a95d41535cb69e73f7d
